epic.description:
Implement HAIAMM Building function practices to establish secure AI development processes.

## Overview

The Building function answers: *How do you build AI agents securely?*

## Practices Included

| Practice | Code | Purpose |
|----------|------|---------|
| Threat Assessment | TA | Identify and prioritize AI-specific threats |
| Security Requirements | SR | Define security requirements for AI systems |
| Secure Architecture | SA | Design secure AI system architectures |

## Target Maturity

- [ ] Level 1: Foundation
- [ ] Level 2: Structured
- [ ] Level 3: Optimized

## Success Criteria

- Threat modeling process established for AI systems
- Security requirements catalog created
- Reference architecture documented
- Design patterns library available

## Key Risks Addressed

- ASI01: Agent Goal Hijack
- ASI02: Tool Misuse & Exploitation
- ASI04: Agentic Supply Chain
- LLM01: Prompt Injection
- LLM04: Data and Model Poisoning

## References

- [HAIAMM Handbook](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/handbook/00-INDEX.md)
- [Top 10 Agentic Risks](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/handbook/04-TOP10-AGENTIC-RISKS.md)
